bibl.title: The Romanity of Roman Egypt: A Faltering Consensus.
bibl.note: Discusses the nature and extent of the differences between Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.
